import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import Calculator from './calculator' import './App.css' const App = () => { const [calc, setCalc] = useState('5') const [firstOperand, setFirstOperand] = useState(null) const [operator, setOperator] = useState(null) const [secondOperand, setSecondOperand] = useState(null) const updateDisplay = (value) => { setCalc(value) } return (
) } export default App
